data.message: Can we fix the Android app please? This glitch of getting notifications and not being able to see them unless I force the app to stop and reopen it every time is annoying. And speaking of news feed. I want to see the most recent posts instead of what you guys think I want to see

replies.message: Hi Teri. If you continue to experience this after uninstalling and reinstalling your app, please report it to us by following these instructions: http://bit.ly/2kTw603. -Joe
Thank you Joe. Doing this right now. I have uninstalled and reinstalled several times already. Very frustrating
